Name: Color Zone
About the game: Color Zone is developed by an independent developer. The main purpose is for people to enjoy playing games. The game is in beta and will be shaped according to the wishes of the players; new game modes, new characters, new maps etc. Don't forget to join the Discord page to be with us while this game is being developed. Have fun! Gameplay: You can conquer the Color Zones in the game by going over them. You have to protect your own zones by fighting with other players. The player with the most zones at the end of the game will win the game! Skills: Stun: The stun skill freezes the player closest to you. It does not affect if the player has a shield. Shield: Protects you from all kinds of attacks. Speed: Speeds up your character. Rocket: Launches a powerful rocket to the nearest player. Bomb: Drops a bomb in front of you.
